conbody.p: data types Impala supports a set of data types that you can use for table columns, expression values, and function arguments and return values.
conbody.note: Currently, Impala supports only scalar types, not composite or nested types. Accessing a table containing any columns with unsupported types causes an error.
conbody.p: For the notation to write literals of each of these data types, see .
See for differences between Impala and Hive data types.
